updated_at.description: Date and time when the image was last updated

shop_url.description: URL of the shop where the image is hosted

product_id.description: Unique identifier of the product associated with the image

admin_graphql_api_id.description: Unique identifier for the image in the Admin GraphQL API

alt.description: Alternative text description of the image for accessibility

width.description: Width of the image in pixels

created_at.description: Date and time when the image was created

variant_ids.description: Array of unique identifiers for the product variants associated with the image

position.description: Position order of the image relative to other images of the same product

height.description: Height of the image in pixels
